name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience ensuring high-performance application delivery in healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in CI/CD, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Azure** and **AWS**, with a strong emphasis on automation and monitoring using tools like **Grafana**, **Zabbix**, and **Graylog**. Skilled in implementing and optimizing CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **TeamCity**. 
Highly experienced in programming with **Python**, and managing system configurations using **Terraform** and **Ansible**. Adept at managing environments in both Unix-like and Windows Server systems. Committed to compliance-driven development in line with HIPAA and PCI DSS standards, and leveraging knowledge in MLOps frameworks like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to enhance data-driven environments. Strong collaboration skills with a focus on delivering robust, scalable solutions.
